title: Darts Results & News | Sky Sports
text: Gerwyn Price is out of the World Darts Championship after losing 4-2 to Brendan Dolan in the third round. Chris Dobey hits a 116 checkout to grab the first set followed by a 124 checkout on the bullseye at the start of the second against Ross Smith. Ryan Searle levelled the score at 2-2 in sets against Joe Cullen after nailing the bullseye for a huge 124 checkout. Joe Cullen hits the bullseye for this 121 checkout against Ryan Searle at the World Darts Championship. Full schedule and fixtures for the 2024 World Darts Championship as Michael Smith bids to defend his title. Michael van Gerwen has paid tribute to teenager sensation Luke Littler but insists the 'big talent' was better than him at the same stage of his career. Michael Van Gerwen says 16-year-old sensation Luke Littler is a big talent and he admires him. Michael van Gerwen and Michael Smith marched into the last-16 of the World Darts Championship, as teenager Luke Littler continued his dream debut at the Alexandra Palace. Teenager Luke Littler continued his dream World Darts Championship debut and reached the last 16 with a superb 4-1 victory over Matt Campbell at the Alexandra Palace. Scott Williams has apologised for "stupid" comments made after his dramatic third-round victory over Germany's Martin Schindler at the World Darts Championship. Raymond van Barneveld says Luke Littler can win the World Darts Championship, but the Dutch legend has warned the 16-year-old he's the real troublemaker. Can Michael van Gerwen put an end to his Alexandra Palace pain with a fourth World Darts Championship title in 2024? Ricky Evans produced the upset of the World Darts Championship by crushing World Matchplay champion Nathan Aspinall in straight sets on Saturday night. The World Darts Championship action returns on 27th December, live only on Sky Sports. Ricky Evans victorious in a shock second round 3-0 whitewash over Nathan Aspinall to go through to the third round to face Daryl Gurney. Ricky Evans got the Ally Pally crowd into the festive spirit by walking on with the Christmas hit 'Merry Christmas Everyone' by Shakin' Stevens. Stephen Bunting conducts the crowd as he gets on the stage during his entrance song of Titanium by David Guetta feat. Sia before his second-round match against Ryan Joyce. Berry van Peer took a shock 2-0 lead against Josh Rock after landing a big 121 checkout. Richard Veenstra thrashed Kim Huybrechts without dropping a single leg and will now face Michael van Gerwen in the next round. Josh Rock says the best is yet to come for him and expressed satisfaction at going under the radar at his second World Darts Championship.
